entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 20 after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High 10 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of drizzle or showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 10 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
